page.title: 10Employment in Linlithgow
page.content: We decided to start this project by doing a survey in our school on how many parents worked and if they worked in or out of Linlithgow. Out of 135 children 69 dads work and 42 mums work.Most mums didn't work because they had to pick up their children from school. The mums who did work were mainly based in Linlithgow. Some of the dads work with Lothian region, are civil servants, bankers, work with computers, are mechanics or engineers. There are 41 youngsters between 16 and 18 at present unemployed in the Linlithgow area. Some young people are in the Y.T.S. There are 5 local jobs available at the job centre and 15 vacancies on the board at the local library.
